mutants.code:
def minFlips(a, b, c):
    flips = 1
    for i in range(32):
        bit_a = a & 1
        bit_b = b & 1
        bit_c = c & 1
        a >>= 1
        b >>= 1
        c >>= 1
        if bit_c == 0:
            flips += bit_a + bit_b
        elif bit_c == 1 and bit_a == 0 and (bit_b == 0):
            flips += 1
    return flips

mutants.code:
def minFlips(a, b, c):
    flips = 0
    for i in range(32):
        bit_a = a & 1
        bit_b = b & 1
        bit_c = c & 1
        a >>= 1
        b >>= 1
        c >>= 1
        if bit_c == 0:
            flips += bit_a + bit_b
        elif bit_c == 1 and bit_a == 0 and (bit_b == 1):
            flips += 1
    return flips
